instructions:
Rinse and pat dry the chicken thighs. Combine the first eight ingredients in mixing bowl and apply as a
rub to both side of the thighs. Marinade the thighs in refrigerator for two hours. Remove from
refrigerator and bring to room temperature as you prepare your grill for indirect grilling. Slow grill the
chicken for two hours turning the chicken every thirty minutes to ensure even grilling. After two hours
spread the charcoal for direct grilling and grill each side for ten minutes to develop a nice crisp skin.
name: Slow Grilled Chicken Thighs
